title: Finally carried myself out of Bronze :D
body: I got told you only get respect from your rank in league, so I finally started playing ranked properly as of 2 weeks ago. Climbed from Bronze 5 to Silver 1 and on towards gold

replies.body: Ignore the dumb cnts out there bro, do ur best, ull achieve ur goals if u work hard!

Hey good work man, I'm sure I'll see you in Silver 1 before too long. 

Also why no {{summoner:6}} Ghost on {{champion:27}} Singed? All the pro's say it's essential.
Congrats man! I've had to climb out of Bronze to Silver 5 three times this year coz of bad internet *sigh*

> [{quoted}](name=BlitzForever,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MIBiHexr,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-12-20T20:42:58.469+0000)
>
> I got told you only get respect from your rank in league, so I finally started playing ranked properly as of 2 weeks ago. Climbed from B5/B1 to Silver 1 and on towards gold

Silver trash, and blitz is a noob champion. NO RESPECT! Kappa

thats the sort of comment i was expecting.

because thats the shit i get when i rank up

> [{quoted}](name=rashadganja,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MIBiHexr,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-20T22:10:12.025+0000)
>
> Silver trash, and blitz is a noob champion. NO RESPECT! Kappa

Notice how he carried by using Singed though? A much better option.
